sources.title: Khaak1973
sources.description: The Soil was awarded the best film and best supporting actor (Faramarz Qaribian) prizes at the Sixth Iranian National Film Festival 'Sepas' in 1974. Noted primarily for its social and political content. Maghsoulou, Bahman. Iranian Cinema, New York: New York UP Hagop Kevorkian Center for Near Eastern Studies, 1987. Cast: Behruz Vossoughi, Faramarz Gharibian, Farzaneh Tayeedi, Jafar Vaali, Jalal Pishvayan, Parvin Soleimani, Nemat Gorji, Nezam Shafayee, Giti Foruhar Cinematography: Nemat Haghighi
